name: Doki Doki Deep Sea (beta)
description:
Doki Doki Deep Sea is a relatively simple otome game suitable for beginners. 

Start your job at Ningyo Aquarium where you'll experience what might be a workplace romance--and maybe a little more.

Currently one out of three routes are available.

This game is still in development, so if you do end up playing it and want to suggest any changes or point out errors we would be very grateful if you commented. This is a project made only by two people with a lot of spare time so we will carefully consider any outside input.

We hope you enjoy!
